description:
Looking for an awesome place while away from home, then you have found it! Its bright, modern and comfy. Everything you will need while on vacation or in NY for business or work. The apartment is close to restaurants, subway, parks, art and culture. It is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Guests have full access to the entire apartment and laundry room with the exception of the boiler room located next to the entryway which is locked at all times.

My concierge service White Glove is available for 24 hour guest support. Their contact information is provided with the welcome email you will receive after you have made a reservation.

The apartment is 1 and a half blocks from the #6 train. The subway stop is St. Lawrence Ave and it is 40 minutes to Grand Central.
name: Delight in Your Home Away from Home in NYC!
review: This is place is a great little apametment
